last_episode_to_air.name: The Fallout
last_episode_to_air.overview: After El Chapo's capture, Kate is thrust into the international spotlight, where she's left feeling betrayed and fearful of the Mexican government.

name: The Day I Met El Chapo: The Kate del Castillo Story
original_name: The Day I Met El Chapo
overview: Mexican superstar actress Kate del Castillo reveals the untold story of her encounter with El Chapo Guzmán, the world’s most-wanted drug lord.

episodes.name: Destined to Meet
episodes.overview: Kate del Castillo reflects on her controversial tweets about El Chapo, which led to her acquiring the rights to his life story.

episodes.name: Face to Face
episodes.overview: Kate and Sean Penn travel to meet El Chapo at a secret location in Mexico, where a discussion about making a movie takes a sudden and shocking turn.

episodes.name: The Fallout
episodes.overview: After El Chapo's capture, Kate is thrust into the international spotlight, where she's left feeling betrayed and fearful of the Mexican government.
